snippet.title: At SXSW, thousands get a Kevin Bacon number of one
snippet.description: Twenty years later, the game that shows how many connections actors have to Kevin Bacon is still strong. Bacon showed up at SXSW, perplexed as to why.

snippet.title: Fabric + algorithm: The fit geek's quest for a suit that fits
snippet.description: A couple of fashion guys team up with a space geek to help men buy the best fitting suit online and try to rise above the tech fit fray.

snippet.title: The first 2013 SEMA show preview is a 1,000-hp Hyundai
snippet.description: It's oddly appropriate that our first peek at the craziest car show of the year kicked off with an absolutely bonkers concept.

snippet.title: Odds & Ends: Scrollability conflicts with Classic; Sleep problem with new iBook
snippet.description: Odds & Ends: Scrollability conflicts with Classic; Sleep problem with new iBook

snippet.title: Weird iOS 7 bug lets you bypass lock to share photos
snippet.description: Apple has admitted there's a bug in its brand-new iOS 7 software that lets you access and share photos without unlocking the phone.

snippet.title: Can we please stop crowdsourcing the English language?
snippet.description: Does anyone know what all this oojamaflip that's been zhooshing up the Collins Dictionary actually means? Crave's Eric Mack has a few suggestions for the future of his mother tongue.

snippet.title: Steve Jobs appears in 1984 Ghostbusters spoof video
snippet.description: Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak appear in a 1984 Ghostbusters spoof showing Apple as 'Blue Busters', taking down the mighty IBM.

snippet.title: How to protect yourself when buying Cheapskate deals
snippet.description: You can help ensure a happy purchase by doing a bit of homework and learning how to resolve any issues that might come up.

snippet.title: Odds & Ends: Scrollability follow-up; Opera default; Mac OS X Server beta 3 expired; Timbuktu expired?
snippet.description: Odds & Ends: Scrollability follow-up; Opera default; Mac OS X Server beta 3 expired; Timbuktu expired?

snippet.title: Man builds girlfriend $125 iPad
snippet.description: A Chinese student who can't afford to buy the real thing builds his girlfriend an iPad from scratch. It's not entirely identical, given that it's adorned with pretty little rhinestones around the outside.
